title: Bug 116744 - Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB:
When using a dynamic text element to display the contents of a database field with three types of content: 
1) HTML text within <html>...</html> tags. 
2) HTML fragments not within <html> tags. 
3) Text with RTF tags, the dynamic text element does not display the content as expected.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1) Prepare a database field with the mentioned types of content. 
2) Create a dynamic text element to display the content. 
3) Ensure the dynamic text element displays the content correctly for all three types.
